actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to H. Res. 43, and without objection, the Members of the House proceeded to the Rotunda of the Capitol to attend the inaugural ceremonies for the President and Vice-President of the United States. Upon completion of the ceremony, pursuant to H. Res. 43, 119th Congress, the House will stand adjourned until noon on Tuesday, January 21, 2025, for Morning-Hour Debate.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTMENT OF THE WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of Rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the resignation of the gentleman from Florida, Mr. Waltz, the whole number of the House is 433.
The House received a communication from Representative Waltz wherein he resigns as a member of the House of Representatives effective on January 20, 2025.
The Chair designated Ms. Dean of PA to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
The Speaker announced approval of the Journal.  Pursuant to clause 1, rule I, the Journal stands approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Virginia Foxx to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
